name: Lesser Heat Core
description: A magical focus core embedded with a fiery ruby that channels pure thermal energy. When integrated into wands, staves, or magical weapons, it allows casters to generate intense heat-based attacks.
properties: Enables heat damage channeling in magical weapons

name: Greater Heat Core
description: A superior magical focus core embedded with a brilliant ruby that channels devastating thermal energy. This enhanced core allows for more powerful heat-based magical attacks.
properties: Enables enhanced heat damage channeling in magical weapons
